import React from "react" import { Col, ListGroup, Row, Image, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap" import { useSelector } from "react-redux" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import Message from "../../components/message/Message" const PlaceOrderPage = ({ history }) => { const { shippingAddress, paymentMethod, cartItems } = useSelector( (state) => state.cartReducer ) if (!shippingAddress) { history.push("/shipping") } else if (!paymentMethod) { history.push("/payment") } const placeOrderHandler = (e) => { console.log(shippingAddress, paymentMethod, cartItems) } // calclute price cartItems.itemPrices = cartItems.reduce((acc, item) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0) cartItems.shipping = cartItems.itemPrices > 100 ? 0 : 40 cartItems.TaxPrice = Number((.15 * cartItems.itemPrices)) return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {shippingAddress?.address} , {shippingAddress?.city} ,{" "} {shippingAddress?.postalCode},{shippingAddress?.country}

payment Method

method: {paymentMethod}

Order Items

{cartItems.length === 0 ? ( your cart is empty ) : ( {cartItems.map((item) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x {item.price} = {item.qty * item.price}$ ))} )}

Order summary

 Items Price $ ${cartItems.itemPrices} Shipping $ Tax $ total $ ) } export default PlaceOrderPage
